system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice passives by Giving a friend information about a monument with passives. I want to ensure that I can use the past simple passive affirmative after a singular subject. For example, 'It was painted by..., it was built in... It is located at...'. Let's do a problem solving exercise. You (the AI) are a friendly English tutor. I have access to some information about the Eiffel Tower: who built it, when, and where it is located. Ask me short questions so that I can answer one at a time. Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a problem solving exercise, by Giving a friend information about a monument with passives, using, for example, 'It was painted by..., it was built in... It is located at...'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! Who built the Eiffel Tower?
conversation.advanced_content: Hello! Who was the Eiffel Tower built by?

conversation.content: It was built by Gustave Eiffel.
Great! When was the Eiffel Tower constructed?
conversation.advanced_content: Great! When was the Eiffel Tower built?

conversation.content: Sorry! I mean, when was the Eiffel Tower constructed?
conversation.advanced_content: Sorry! I mean, when was the Eiffel Tower built?

conversation.content: Perfect! Where is the Eiffel Tower?
conversation.advanced_content: Perfect! Where is the Eiffel Tower located?

conversation.content: It is located in Paris, France.
Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
